org.opentrafficsim.core.network

Class AbstractNode<ID,P>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opentrafficsim.core.network.AbstractNode<ID,P>
  • Type Parameters:
    ID - the ID type.
    P - the point type, e.g., com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Point, DirectedPoint.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, nl.tudelft.simulation.dsol.animation.LocatableInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractExpansionNode

    public abstract class AbstractNode<ID,P>
extends Object
implements nl.tudelft.simulation.dsol.animation.LocatableInterface, Serializable
    The Node is a point with an id. It is used in the network to connect Links.
